name: The Villisca House
description:
A short horror game inspired by the tragic events that took place at the Villisca Ax Murder House.

This project is being used as a capstone for my graduation from IUPUI for Media Arts and Sciences. I had one semester to work on this project and I learned a ton along the way. 

While this project will not be made into anything further, I have learned a lot from the production and cannot wait to take what I've learned into my next project. If you enjoy the project and want to support me as a poor starving indie game developer, it would be greatly appreciated but never expected.

I hope you enjoy my short horror game!
